about.title: Staking.Simplified.
about.text:
Stkr is a decentralized protocol 
and platform that combines staking and DeFi, implementing elements from traditional staking with non-custodial staking, Micropools and decentralized governance.
about.marketing-success: Thanks! We are glad that you are with us

empty.title: Create your first micropool node
empty.paragraph-1: By creating a Micropool, you will be spinning up an Ethereum 2.0 node. The Micropool then becomes available for people to stake their ETH into. The more Micropools you run, the more rewards you can generate!
empty.paragraph-2: You can create multiple Micropools (and therefore Ethereum nodes) on your host, however be aware that too many nodes may degrade performance and cause slashing to occur on your existing nodes, so be careful to remain within the constraints your hardware permits.

what-is.title:
What is Ethereum
2.0?
what-is.note1: Ethereum 2.0 is an ambitious multi-year network upgrade of Ethereum that will achieve better scalability, security and decentralization. Take a read through the design goals outlined in Ethereum 2.0’s official spec or Vitalik’s write-up on Serenity’s design rationale to learn more about the guiding principles of Ethereum 2.0's design.
what-is.note2: In the upcoming Phase 0 of Ethereum 2.0, the Beacon Chain will be launched. The Beacon Chain relies on Proof of Stake for network security. Anyone with 32 ETH can participate as a validator and receive rewards for contributing to Ethereum 2.0’s security. Learn more about Ethereum 2.0 in our beginner's guide.

subheader.1: We are happy to present ETH 2.0 stake possibility
